poverty.name: Average Poverty
poverty.description: Sum of the Official Development Assistance disbursed to support activities in the basic education sector of development partner countries, as reported by donors and expressed as a percentage of Gross Domestic Product. Basic education aid includes flows directed to: primary education, basic life skills for youth and adults and early childhood education.

gdp.name: GDP
gdp.description: International Monetary Fund, World Economic Outlook Database (October 2013) and Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, Creditor Reporting System (December 2013)

car_color.name: Car color
car_color.description: Aid committed for education plus 20 percent of General Budget Support committed. Divide the aid committed for total education in a given year by the GDP of the country and multiply by 100.
